name: Number of Displaced People
description: Indicates total number of displaced persons (IDP + Refugee) in each first level administrative unit

name: Estimated Total Population
description: Current population estmations from a variety of sources

name: Conflict Event Locations
description: Points representing the location of individual conflict events

name: Fatalities from Conflict Events
description: Indicates total number of fatalities in conflict incidents in each first level administrative unit

name: Funding Progress on Latest Appeal
description: Percentage of current requirements that have been met
